title: Answer Product Material Inquiry
description: A customer with an allergy asks what materials a specific piece of jewelry is made of.

tasks.description: Identify the jewelry product in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the product details for the 'Silver Heart Necklace'.

tasks.description: Check the product's material composition in the specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the material is '925 Sterling Silver, Nickel-Free'.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the exact materials, specifically mentioning that it is nickel-free.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear and accurate answer that addresses the customer's allergy concern.
